plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and often bright petals. Bees love to visit me! What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can find me in a garden.
☀️ I need sunshine to grow.
💧 I need water to live

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk and many branches. Birds build nests in me! What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can use me to build things.
🍁 I might have leaves that change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb on me.

plant.question: I am long and orange and often grow in gardens. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am crunchy.
🌱 I grow under the ground.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.

plant.question: I have prickly skin and grow in the desert. I store water inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I thrive in dry, hot climates.
🏜️ Some types of me have flowers
💧 I can survive with very little water.

plant.question: I start as a tiny seed, then sprout and grow towards the light. What am I doing?

hints.text: 🌱 This is how all plants begin.
⬆️ I'm reaching for the sun.
💧 Water helps me do this.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant and gives you a fluffy treat at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can eat me with butter and salt.
🌽 I grow on a cob.
🎬 I am a popular snack at the cinema.

plant.question: I'm a plant that climbs and holds on tight. My fruit is purple, green or red and tastes so right! What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 People make juice from me.
🪴 I need a trellis or fence to climb.

plant.question: I'm a very tall tree with needles instead of leaves. People often decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
🐻 Some animals live in forests made of me
🎁 I smell nice and piney.

plant.question: I am a special plant that can trap insects for food. I live in swampy areas. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I have a clever way to catch my meals.
👄 I look like I have a mouth.
🐸 Frogs sit on my leaves and don't get eaten!

plant.question: I am a seed that can be ground into flour. My grains are used to make bread, pasta, and many other foods. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am a staple food around the world.
🍞 You can make sandwiches with the product made from me.
🌍 I grow in fields and am harvested in the fall.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make something sweet.
🐝 I have black and yellow stripes.
🌸 I visit flowers.

bug.question: I'm a tiny insect that works with my family. We build big homes and carry things together. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very strong for my size.
🌱 I can be found in the ground or in trees.
👑 We live in colonies.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and start as a caterpillar. I fly around sipping nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I go through a big change.
🌷 I am often seen in gardens.
🎨 I have pretty patterns on my wings.

bug.question: I hop around in grassy fields and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I have long legs.
🌿 I like to eat plants.
🎵 I make noise by rubbing my legs together.

bug.question: I'm a small, round beetle with spots. I'm considered lucky and help farmers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am often red or orange.
👨‍🌾 I eat other bugs that hurt plants.
⚫ I have black spots.

bug.question: I glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use light to attract a partner
🌃 I am nocturnal.
💡 I have a light-producing organ.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs but I'm not an insect, what am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I have fangs.
🪰 Flies often get stuck in my creation.

bug.question: I like to feast on blood and spread diseases, like malaria. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I am small and bite.
🌃 I usually come out at dusk.
🌊 I breed in water.

bug.question: I'm a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and branches. I look like a twig. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I mimic nature.
💚 My camouflage is impressive.
🌳 I can be long and thin.

bug.question: I am a predator with strong front legs that catch other insects. I can look like I'm praying. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I look like I am praying.
💚 I am usually green.
🦗 I like to eat grasshoppers.
